subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller and a former girlfriend, Sara McKenna, agreed to share time with their infant son for the next four months, calming a court fight as Miller prepares for the Sochi Olympics.
snippet: Bode Miller and a former girlfriend, Sara McKenna, agreed to share time with their infant son for the next four months, calming a court fight as Miller prepares for the Sochi Olympics.
